thread.title: Salman Khan Keen to Watch 'Singh is Bliing'
thread.title_full: Salman Khan Keen to Watch 'Singh is Bliing'

title: Salman Khan Keen to Watch 'Singh is Bliing'
text:
Email 0 
MUMBAI: Bollywood superstar Salman Khan says he found Akshay Kumar and Amy Jackson “really good” in the promos of the Prabhudheva directorial "Singh is Bling" and wants to see the film.Trailer of Salman's forthcoming film "Prem Ratan Dhan Payo" was released alongside Akshay Kumar-starrer "Singh is Bliing". “Going to see SIB ('Singh is Bling'), heard it's funny...dint know prdp ('Prem Ratan Dhan Payo') trailer released vit SIB. From the promos akki (Akshay) is looking really good and so is Amy,” Salman posted on Twitter on Saturday.“Singh is Bliing”, which released on Friday, also stars Lara Dutta and Kay Kay Menon. The film collected Rs.20.67 crore on its opening day.Meanwhile, “Prem Ratan Dhan Payo” trailer, which was released on October 1, is gracing towards five million views on YouTube.The Sooraj Barjatya directorial, which also stars Sonam Kapoor, Neil Nitin Mukesh and Anupam Kher, is slated to release on November 12.
